text:
I‚Äôve tried their Mount Fabre and Espresso Romano. And i really got amazed with the drinks Espresso Romano, it is combination of Americano + Lemon sparking juice, the taste is so NICE!!

Highly recommended with this drink. Will repeat order again if i go thereüòç

Sad that the quality has dropped since I last visited ): see photos for the difference in standard of the english muffins served. Now, the English muffin is not toasted evenly and properly on both sides and is soggy

I really enjoyed my first time trying the english muffins here so I‚Äôm writing this review in hopes that it can be improved‚Ä¶
My go to place for an affordable cup of iced matcha latte. I usually get a strawberry matcha latte for $7, super worth and the taste is great too.

I have been to this place before a few times. It was a guy with specs who was the barrister. He made fantastic coffee. The coffee beans they have is really nice. Taste of coffee is good.

But this visit today, not only the coffee tasted thin, the staff also had terrible attitude. The spec guy was gone. There were 2 young gals manning the counter with an older female whom I tink is the manager.

I was at the side looking at the menu as it was previously where I had ordered before. I did not realise the cashier had changed to face the front.

I asked a qn and was told by 2 young gals chatting at a corner to come over to the cashier to ask the qn.

I am not buying the drink as yet. I tink as service staff, it would be polite to come over and answer the qn than to rudely ask the customer to head over to the cashier just so you don‚Äôt have to walk.

Mind you, the place was empty except for 2 customers sitting and having their drinks. The staff were not doing anything.

Thankfully the older staff came over to speak with me. She might have been the manager perhaps. After answering my qn, she politely advised that the payment machines were at the front therefore I would need to proceed to the front to make my order.

At the cashier, I told the staff that the least she could do was to answer my qn first as I was not placing any orders. And her reply was ‚Äúwhat?!‚Äù

Such rude people should never be employed in the service line. I‚Äôm sure she was very happy just chatting away with her colleague before I rudely interrupted their chat.

The manager was at the side on her laptop. I had stood there for quite awhile before I asked my qn.

Obviously no one was interested in sales or retaining the clients.

Really unfortunate for the boss.

strawberry matcha latte is sooo good! really nice and deep matcha flavour and the strawberry puree is not very sweet too, everything tastes amazing after u mix it for a bit. pls never take this off the menu!!
